bestBHT.bht: After about an hour, someone confidently declared, in no uncertain terms, that they had seen him with Jesus. It was clear that he was a Galilean because his speech gave him away.

Archibald T. Robertson: After the space of about one hour...It means standing in two or apart, about an hour intervening.
For he is a Galilean...it was his speech that gave him away.
John Gill: another confidently affirmed...as an unquestionable truth, and beyond all doubt.
I saw him there, and it may be depended on as a truth
you may know him by his language, and which confirms my assertion.
John Wesley: And about one hour after — So he did not recollect himself in all that time.
